title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 31
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 31
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Lands' End (LE). Lands' End Inc.'s shares faltered in their bid to rebound from a record low after fiscal second-quarter results were disappointing. The apparel retailer had a loss for the fifth time in six quarters, and the latest loss was wider than the average analyst estimate in a Bloomberg survey. The bottom line outweighed Lands' End's sales, which rose from a year earlier for the first time since Sears Holdings Inc. spun off the company in 2014.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
